messages.subject: New Addition
messages.msgSnippet: We have a new family member! A kitten! She s fluffy, white, blue eyed, has 6 toes on her front paws and is absolutely adorable. Tamzin has continued with the
messages.messageBody:
We have a new family member!
A kitten!
She's fluffy, white, blue eyed, has 6 toes on her front paws and is
absolutely adorable.
Tamzin has continued with the fruit theme (our other cat is
named Apple) and has named her Coconut.
Apple is not impressed with the new arrival, but the dogs have
taken her arrival in stride. Angel (the big lab/retriver mix) is
positively in love with her - very cute -. She follows her
everywhere and lays down beside her when she sleeps.
Two of Tamzin's friends are sleeping over tonight and they've just
come into the room pushing her doll stroller with, you guessed it,
Coconut in it. She's a very tolerant and maleable little kitten <g>.

Meghan
